alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:36AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 1115 AM EDT... At 1035 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Marco Island, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds possible and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Everglades City, Golden Gate Estates, Carnestown, Belle Meade, Cape Romano, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, Naples Park, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Lely and Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
